about_the_game:
Girls' Kitchen Diner

Girls' Kitchen Diner is a vibrant cooking game full of personality, where a group of skilled women runs a restaurant their way. Among scattered ingredients, stoves catching fire, and demanding customers, the characters face daily challenges while balancing work, friendship, and unexpected romantic moments. With an engaging mix of comedy and chaos, the restaurant becomes the perfect stage to show that talent, care, and a pinch of madness are the main ingredients for success – and maybe even for love. 🍔🍟🍕🌭

  • OLIVIA 🍏

  • BIANCA 🍋

  • CAROL 🍑

  • LIZ 🍇

  • THE CRITIC 🍒

The playable characters in Girls' Kitchen Diner are talented and charismatic women, each with unique cooking skills and striking personalities. The datable characters bring an extra dose of charm and fun to the story, with relationships developing unexpectedly, adding romance and many twists to the culinary chaos. 🥪🌮🌯🥙

name: Girls Kitchen Dinner Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Girls' Kitchen Diner is a chaotic and fun cooking game, where only women run the restaurant. Amid urgent orders, unpredictable situations, and unexpected romances, the characters discover that in the kitchen, chaos and love are always on the menu!
